changes.text: Added a validation check in Forecast function to prevent forecasting with insufficient data.
Combined the Insights and Followers Alert messages into a single pop-up.
Added a pop-up table display for the Forecast Data.
Added a condition - Forecast Data works on having minimum of 3 data points.
Added Icons to improve UI/UX. Used React Models Icons for this.
Removed the delete option from the entries.
Removed Old Design Layout for the footer
Removed all the text from the buttons
